DiversityText: Great Commission Church is a globally diverse church which is committed to racial equality and justice for all. Our mission is to find greatness in people and empower them to prosper, through proclaiming the Good news of Jesus Christ which has immediate and eternal implications for human flourishing.

PrayerText.title: Need a Prayer?
PrayerText.description: There are times when life is overwhelming when all we have is questions. In those moments hope can feel away. The great thing is that prayer shifts our perspective towards the One God who stands ready to listen. No matter what you're facing, we'd love to pray with you.

aboutUs.tagline: Everybody is somebody because of the in dwelling Spirit of God
aboutUs.description: We are a church that trusts in God, the power of Jesus Christ's resurrection, and the presence of the Holy Spirit. We hold that everyone has value because of the presence of the Holy Spirit. Seeing the gifts others possess shown is what we care about most.

belief.title: Belief
belief.description: We are a faith based church that believe nothing is impossible with God if you believe.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.description: We respect God,our leadership and people,we are optimistic in all that we do as church and about integrity that define who we are.

commitment.title: Committed
commitment.description: We are committed to teaching faith,evangelise to the world with the word of God that will touch and transform lives into Godâ€™s created image.
